keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to widen the A64 & improve rail links.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Secure our share of NHS funding
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Push for further investment for specialized services.
Build upon 6.49% per-pupil funding increase in York Outer.
Build upon the 13% average growth in wages for York in 2019.
Pass the PM's new deal and honour the result of the 2016 referendum.

issues.brexitEurope: Pass the PM's new deal and honour the result of the 2016 referendum.
issues.economy: Build upon the 13% average growth in wages for York in 2019.
issues.education: More resources for local schools - Build upon 6.49% per-pupil funding increase in York Outer.
issues.environment: Protect our environment - Safeguard against inappropriate development.
issues.health: Secure our share of NHS funding - Push for further investment for specialized services.
